translation: He who, seated like one unconcerned, is not moved by the dualities, and who, knowing that the dualities are active, is self-centered and does not move.
commentary: 14.23 like one unconcerned? seated: seated? by the Gunas? who who? Not not? Vichalyate is moved? Gunas the Gunas? are operate? It is thus? Eve even? who who? Avatisthati is selfcentred? Not not? Ingate moves.Commentary He is seated as a neutral (one who inclines to neither party). He is free from likes and dislikes. He is entirely unconcerned whether the alities with their effects and the body
